frontmatter.title: Aniketh Girish selected as Research Intern at IIJ, Tokyo
frontmatter.author: amfoss
frontmatter.description: Aniketh Girish selected as Research Intern at Innovation Institute of Internet Initiative Japan (IIJ-II) at Tokyo, Japan for a period of 2 months starting this June

frontmatter.title: 2 of our members have been selected for a Summer School Program at the Ben Gurion University, Israel
frontmatter.author: amfoss
frontmatter.description: Our members, Venu Vardhan Reddy and Gopa Vasanth have been selected for a Summer School Program at the Ben-Gurion University of the Negev, Israel.

frontmatter.title: Yash Khare selected for FOSSASIA Internship 2019
frontmatter.author: amfoss
frontmatter.description: Yash Khare, a first-year member of the club has been accepted to the FOSSASIA Internship Program 2019.

frontmatter.title: Gopa Vasanth invited for the Wikimedia Hackathon 2019 at Prague, Czech Republic
frontmatter.author: amfoss
frontmatter.description: Our active member, Gopa Vasanth has been invited and fully-funded to participate in the Wikimedia Hackathon 2019 at Prague, Czech Republic

frontmatter.title: 14 Students from Amritapuri Campus Selected for GSoC 2019

frontmatter.description: 14 Students from Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham, Amritapuri Campus selected for Google Summer of Code 2019 Program.

frontmatter.title: Team consisting of Yash Khare bag second prize in the UNESCO-FOSSASISA Hackathon 2019 at Singapore
frontmatter.author: amfoss
frontmatter.description: A team consisting of first-year member, Yash Khare bag second prize in the UNESCO-FOSSASIA Hackathon (IBM Cloud Category) conducted at FOSSASIA Summit 2019, Singapore
